WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex issues and suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some issues and feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues

Comments.Message: Would be happy to see the PR!
Code is on codeplex but I don't know if/when the CLA will get delivered (big company).

My fix was actually a side effect of getting the doc comment associated with the parameter symbol.

Here's my PR with the changes
https://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/network/forks/AdamFreidin/typescript/contribution/6896

But I'm having trouble with one aspect, see line 45 of tests/cases/fourslash/commentsInlinedComments.ts
